body: I think the only controversial change here is a change in how our configuration scopes are presented. Previously, we listed the custom scope added via `--config-scope` as "command line" scope. However, there is actually a higher precedence scope of build settings listed on the command line. I separated "command line" into "custom" and "command line" to distinguish this. Let me know how people feel about this change before I make the same change to the Configuration Tutorial.
title: Updates to Configuration Files docs for SC18
